title: Drawing, "Desk: Seating at Center, Center Drawer, Three Stacked Drawers-Left and Right-with One Vertical Aluminum Pull Spanning Stack, the Whole Elevated on Curved Aluminum Base", 1930s
markings: Stamped in black ink at lower right, DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY; repeated underneath in reverse position
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions in graphite throughout. Inscribed in graphite in lower right hand corner [Deskey #] 7407. Inscribed in graphite at lower left, BLACK LACQUER-POL[ISHED] ALUM[INUM]. Inscribed in red colored pencil at lower right P.
